resources.title: Past USNCO Exams
resources.description: An Invaluable resource for USNCO participants. It provides all of the past USNCO exams, and some of the more recent exams have solutions attatched to them as well. We recommend you trying these out as soon as you have covered your fundamentals!

resources.title: USNCO Quizzes
resources.description: Made by Andrew Ni, this resource can be useful if you would like to practice a particular topic in USNCO.

resources.title: Atkin's Chemical Principles
resources.description: Atkin's Chemical Principles is an invaluable textbook for not oly U.S. participants, but for all competitive chemistry learners. It is frequently used as a textbook for Honors courses in undergraduate introductory chemistry.

resources.title: IChO Recommendations
resources.description: Written by a Gold IChO Medalist ('20) and CODS staff, Anugrah goes over what practice problems you should utilize to prepare for IChO.

resources.title: Past IChO Exams
resources.description: A three-part book has been made that compiles the past 50 years of ICho exams.

resources.title: Past IChO Exams by Topic
resources.description: A compilation of Past IChO questions by topic.

description: Here are some textbooks that we generally recommend for all chemistry Olympiad competitors. For more information, please refer to our introductory guide in courses.

resources.title: Chemistry by Zumdahl
resources.description: A very good introductory book, easy-to-understand explanations, excellent practice problems, does not cover all fo the necessary material required.

resources.title: Chemical Principles by Atkins
resources.description: Very good introductory book, compact explanations, decent practice problems, much more detailed than Zumdahl.

resources.title: Organic Chemistry by Klein
resources.description: Very good introductory book, easy-to-understand explanations, decent practice problems, provides the fundamentals of organic chemistry knowledge.

resources.title: Organic Chemistry by Clayden
resources.description: Very good intermediate book, outstanding explanations, outstanding practice problems, much more detailed than Klein, all you need for IChO.
